sentences.en: A capacitor is the electrical equivalent of the bucket.
sentences.cn: 电容器就是吊桶的电子等价物.

sentences.en: A capacitor is used to eliminate sparking when a circuit containing inductance is suddenly opened.
sentences.cn: 当含有电感的电路突然断开时,电容器可用以消除火花.

sentences.en: A sector of a cylindrical capacitor may thus be utilized as an energy filter.
sentences.cn: 柱面扇形电容器可作为能量过滤器.

sentences.en: An electrode, as in a storage battery or capacitor.
sentences.cn: 蓄电池或电容器中的电极.

sentences.en: Any two conductors separated by an insulator are said to form a capacitor.
sentences.cn: 由绝缘体隔开任何两个导体就组成电容器.

sentences.en: Because this capacitor is not perfect, the charge gradually leaks away.
sentences.cn: 因为这个电容器并不精准, 所以电荷逐渐流失.

sentences.en: Capacitance of conductor capacitor electric field energy and energy density .
sentences.cn: 导体的电容；电容器。电场的能量和能量密度。

sentences.en: However, in contrast to batteries, a capacitor cannot store enough energy to power anything that lasts longer than a flash -- some fraction of a second.
sentences.cn: 但是，相比电池，电容器储存的能量不足以维持任何比闪光时间长的时间，而闪光时间还不足一秒。

sentences.en: I replaced the capacitor using a rude technique, and fixed the problem.
sentences.cn: 我用一种简单的技术替换了电容器, 解决了问题.

sentences.en: Make sure the capacitor bank is voltage-free.
sentences.cn: 确信电容器组不带电压。

sentences.en: Part of this process involves applying an electric field to a dielectric material within the capacitor.
sentences.cn: 这个过程中需要在电容器内的绝缘材料上施加一个电场。

sentences.en: The ability of a capacitor to store electrical energy is termed capacitance.
sentences.cn: 电容器存储电能的能力叫电容.

sentences.en: The capacitor is used for tank circuit, coupling by - pass and feed circuit.
sentences.cn: 该电容器供槽路 、 耦合、傍路及馈电电路使用.

sentences.en: The capacitor of safe - film and the mechanism of explosion protection.
sentences.cn: 与安全膜电容器及其防爆机理>>相似的文献.

sentences.en: The DC capacitor will not be used in across - the - line circuit.
sentences.cn: 不要将直流电容器用作 跨 线电容器.

sentences.en: The second resistor has been replaced by a capacitor.
sentences.cn: 第二个电阻已由一个电容所代替。

sentences.en: The system is automatic seasoning select machine of tube - shaped electrolytic capacitor.
sentences.cn: 该系统为末端成单筒 状 的电解电容自动老练分选机.

sentences.en: Then after a session with the steel wool, the capacitor was presentable.
sentences.cn: 然后经过会议,与钢铁,羊毛, 电容器是像样.

sentences.en: There is a capacitor in there.
sentences.cn: 因为里面有一个电容器。

sentences.en: These two factors should be considered in selection of the capacitance of the circuit-breaker capacitor.
sentences.cn: 在选择断路器电容器的电容量时应该综合考虑以上两种因素。

sentences.en: This action externally appears like the discharge of a capacitor.
sentences.cn: 这一作用从外表上看来像电容器的放电现象。

sentences.en: This arrangement is known as a parallel - plate capacitor.
sentences.cn: 这种装置称为平行板电容器.
